description: CSV definition for Upra Nacional layers. The field-mappings element is used to map the fields from the mapping definition to the destination. The order of the fields in the field-mappings element is the order of the fields in the destination file. Each string in the array is the name of the field in mapping definition. The field-mappings element is optional. If it is not present, the fields in the destination file will be the same as the fields in the mapping file.
